text:
Large selection of household products.
You can find wide variety of tools, diy, home items, locks and many more here.

Unlike other hardware store, the walking path is wide, bright and neat.

The reason for deducting 2 stars are the staff. The ladies do not know the tools, not helpful, lack of empathy and not knowledgeable.

Hopefully they can have staff that know about hardware.
Is very big, and many household and DIY items

This is your classic neighbourhood hardware store but with a far more extensive selection that your usual run of the mill one. You can get anything here: paint, nails, stationary, door handles, tools, even cheap $2 porcelain mugs.
Usual household products from China. Normally it is costlier than the alternate household mart in Taman Jurong Shopping Centre.
Usual homemart with variety of products mainly from China. Price is bit higher as compared to similar shops.
